snippet.title: HERO: Flood Rescue - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Add to wishlist - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1026720/HERO_Flood_Rescue/



Be a part of a rescue team and help people affected by flood. Become a helicopter pilot, medic, rescuer or a war veteran. Lead the rescue team to save as many people as possible. During rescue operations you will use specialistic equipment such as: pontoon, helicopter, fire truck, etc. 



#Flood #Rescue #Simulator
